Class Solve

java.lang.Object
  Solve
All Implemented Interfaces:
SolveClass
public class Solve
extends java.lang.Object
implements SolveClass

Solve.java Contains methods to load, solve, and print a Sudoku puzzle All methods have the implied precondition that any locations given as parameters are valid on a 9x9 grid. All numbers are referenced as 0-8 rather than 1-9. Conversion occurs in both directions. North Haven High School Team The Fedoras Teacher Marilynn Kramar Students Charlie Hoyt, Lily Seropian, Mike Perrone, Vincent Jakiela, Victor Wang, and Prakhar Bansal Email: cthoyt@gmail.com, lilyseropian@gmail.com, mike.j.perrone@gmail.com, vtjakiela@yahoo.com, wangvictor09@hotmail.com, prakhar_bansal2005@hotmail.com, Kramar.Marilynn@north-haven.k12.ct.us
